snippet: Reigning French soccer champions Paris St Germain have agreed to sign Germany international Julian Draxler, sports newspaper L'Equipe and RMC Sport reported on Thursday....
lead_paragraph: Reigning French soccer champions Paris St Germain have agreed to sign Germany international Julian Draxler, sports newspaper L'Equipe and RMC Sport reported on Thursday.

headline.main: Paris St Germain 'to Sign Draxler From Wolfsburg'
headline.print_headline: Paris St Germain 'to Sign Draxler From Wolfsburg'
